name: Reflex - Fast reaction game
description:
Reflex is a minimalistic game where you can test your reflex against other players around the world.

How to play:
Tap the reflex before it disappears from the screen.

Too easy? We wouldn't bet on that...

Features:
- iPhone X support
- iOS 9 Support
- Gamecenter Highscore Ranking
- Small size
- Apple exclusive Game
